Zeitraum.description: The time range in the format DD.MM.YY - DD.MM.YY, where the second date is equal to or later than the first date. Validation of this condition must be performed programmatically.

akad. Grad.description: The academic degree of the participant

Vorname.description: The first name of the participant

Nachname.description: The last name of the participant

Name.description: The name associated with the exhibition or fair

Ausstellung-, Messe.description: The type of event: exhibition or fair

Land.description: The country where the event is held

Art.description: The nature or category of the event: Nat. (National) or Int. (International)

Teilnahme an.description: Details of participation in the event

Freigabe.description: Approval or release status of the event

Gewicht.description: Indicates whether weight is applicable: Ja (Yes) or Nein (No)

Regel.description: The rule or regulation associated with the event, represented as a numeric value
